name: The Great Alchemist
description:
The Great Alchemist is my first solo project after making Valley defense with a team.
It is going to be an RPG game about an alchemist trainer who wants to be the Great Alchemist of his/her hometown.

The main character will have heal/support/medicine using skills as main skills
There will be Quests and Exploration in the game as well.
For example, Exploring another town such as swordman town, wizard town, etc.
Therefore, there will be a lot of coding stuff I need to learn and it is going to be a long journey, but I am sure I will have fun.

This is still a prototype to test the codes,
some codes work but some don't.
I will make sure to update it as soon as possible.

Main System to develop as my tasks.
- Skill system (using Scriptable object)
- Quest system
- Inventory system (using Scriptable object)
- Craft system
- Save system
etc.

Done features:
- Player/ Monsters Healths (can die)
- Basic Movement/ Basic Attack
- Camera Rotation/Zoom (Right-click)
- Enemy AI

Note
This version is still not done well.
- Fireball skill doesn't come out as it is supposed to 
- Player doesn't stop walking toward the monster while shooting skill.
- Fireball animation and Basic movement animations are overlapping.  
- Alpha1 + click = release Fireball skill, but It won't go back to normal mode 
which means if you continued clicking another space it still releases a fireball even if you don't press Alpha1
